hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #the Minuet of Forest#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Shadow Temple Compass#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say only one heart piece in all of Hyrule will declare the holder a winner.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that scoring 1500 in #horseback archery# grants #the Megaton Hammer#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of the Triforce#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Market# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 2 Top

GC (Maze).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Piece of the Triforce#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

GV (Waterfall).text: Are you sure you want to play this? Wanna go get some tacos or something?

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #the Fire Arrows#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern End of Bridge Chest

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Strength Upgrade#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that the Zora's Domain #diving game and torch run# lead to...^ #a Bow# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that in the #central rooms of the well# spiders hold...^ #the Light Medallion# and #a Red Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well GS West Inner Room
Bottom of the Well GS East Inner Room

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Magic Meter#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: ${12 68 79}They say that monarchy is a terrible system of governance.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #a Bow#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that ##Hyrule Field## has #3# major items.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of the Triforce#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of the Triforce#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #the Minuet of Forest#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #the Market# is on the path of #gold#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 4 Top

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Zora Scale# and #a Piece of the Triforce#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the way of the hero.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals a solitary #Cow#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #the Zora Sapphire#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #the Ice Cavern#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the path of #gold#.
hinted_locations: ZR Near Open Grotto Freestanding PoH

ToT (Left).text: They say that ##the Spirit Temple## has #6# major items.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of the Triforce#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that ##Hyrule Castle## has #2# major items.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Shadow Temple Compass#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of the Triforce#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of the Triforce#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #collecting cuccos# rewards #a Spirit Temple Compass#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Deku Stick Capacity# and #a Red Potion Bottle#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Desert Colossus# is on the path of #gold#.
